Body:
"""Test generate_threshold_settings_csv."""
data_for_csv = list()
data_for_csv.append([pc.CATEGORY, pc.METRIC, pc.FIRST_THRESH, pc.SEC_THRESH,
    pc.ALERT_ERR, pc.KPI])
threshold_settings = self.p_data.threshold_settings_resp.get(pc.PERF_THRESH)
for threshold in threshold_settings:
    category = pc.ARRAY
    data_for_csv.append([category, threshold.get(pc.METRIC), threshold.get(
        pc.FIRST_THRESH), threshold.get(pc.SEC_THRESH), threshold.get(pc.
        ALERT_ERR), threshold.get(pc.KPI)])
with mock.patch.object(file_handler, 'write_to_csv_file') as mck_write:
    self.perf.generate_threshold_settings_csv(output_csv_path='fake_csv')
    mck_write.assert_called_once_with('fake_csv', data_for_csv)
